mapper.select: select count(*) from recipegoodbad where rnum=#{rnum} and memid=#{memid}

select * from (select a.rnum, a.rname, a.rimage, a.rprice, b.good ,row_number() over (order by b.good desc) rank from (select rnum, rname, rimage, rprice from recipe) a inner join (select distinct rnum, sum(good) OVER (partition by rnum) as good from recipegoodbad) b on a.rnum=b.rnum) where rank between 1 and 4

select * from (select a.rnum, a.rname, a.rimage, a.rprice, b.good ,row_number() over (order by b.good desc) rank from (select rnum, rname, rimage, rprice from recipe) a inner join (select distinct rnum, sum(good) OVER (partition by rnum) as good from recipegoodbad) b on a.rnum=b.rnum) where rank between 5 and 8
select * from (select rnum, rname, rimage, rprice, rinputdate, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by RINPUTDATE desc) rank from recipe) where rank between 1 and 4
select * from (select rnum, rname, rimage, rprice, rinputdate, ROW_NUMBER() over (order by RINPUTDATE desc) rank from recipe) where rank between 5 and 8
select sum(good) as good, sum(bad) as bad from recipegoodbad where rnum= #{rnum}
